name: Visual Content Template
description: Template for generating images, videos, and visual content
template:
Create a visual content with the following specifications:

Subject/Description: $$subject$$

Visual Style: $$visual_style$$
(e.g., Photo-realistic, Digital Art, Concept Sketch, 3D Render, Watercolor, Minimalist)

Lighting: $$lighting$$
(e.g., Dramatic Studio Light, Golden Hour, Soft Ambient, Neon, Natural Daylight)

Composition/Angle: $$composition$$
(e.g., Wide Shot, Close-up, Bird's Eye View, Depth of Field, Symmetrical)

Quality: $$quality$$
(e.g., 4K, Ultra Detailed, Cinematic, High Resolution, Professional Grade)

Additional Context: $$context$$

Special Instructions: $$instructions$$

examples.output: Visual prompt for a space cat with proper specifications
